text: “Samuer hɨgim, mba tugen mbe Isreriŋ, mbe ŋgui gari guman pana vuzvugi. Mbe ne vuzvugiap, Fhe Bakɨme nzuaim, ana mbaram mbe ŋgui gari guman pan kɨr zav Sor ndi fagi. Ana mben ŋgui gari guman pan kav, mbe gari. Sor mben ŋgui gari guman pan kav kim, 40 mpari vhɨzgi. Sor ana Kisan kam ma, ana Benzaminan shɨga mbe ma.
